title: Update: Should She Tell Her Boyfriend About This Life-Changing Secret?
description:
Over 15 years ago, her boyfriend’s sister told her a MAJOR family secret about her boyfriend. At the time, she was dating him so it was easy for her to swear never to tell a soul.
But this secret is lifechanging, and she thinks he needs to know this information. So what does she do?! Tell him or take the secret to the grave?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
